name: Lucky's Table
description:
Come on in! We’ve recently got a classic Japanese table in; it’s in the back if you want to check it out. Mind you don’t trip, though, the floor’s a bit uneven back there.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare Compo 49.

Recommended controls: Left and right mouse buttons operate the flippers and launcher; moving the mouse pushes the table around.

Keyboard (Z/X/Space/Arrows) and Gamepad are also supported.
